abstract: Vincenzo Nibali is ejected from Vuelta a Espana bicycle race for holding on to support vehicle after being involved in crash during second stage, which Esteban Chaves won.
lead_paragraph: Nibali, a former Tour de France champion, was thrown out of the Vuelta a España for holding on to a support vehicle after a crash.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Cycling; Nibali Ejected for Violation

snippet: Nibali, a former Tour de France champion, was thrown out of the Vuelta a España for holding on to a support vehicle after a crash.
